title: Remake is even more r%%%%%ed than dynamic queue...
body: So much fun waiting 30 minutes to get into a game only to have it remade in the first 3 minutes and wait another god damn 30 minutes to get in a game.

replies.body: The alternative is you complaining about waiting 30 minutes for a game just to have an afk.. you know that right?

I am perfectly fine playing 4v5. It isn't a game of skill so number differences can be overcome by me simply out statting the other team (if my team doesn't feed) then trying to organize the lemmings into a makeshift fighting dummies to end the game before the other team inevitably catches up in stats by around 45 minutes

Lol. And yet your not a pro in this no skill game...

Weird. Wonder why.

Inb4 "I have a life" or "I make millions already"

Love this community.

They complain how afks are ruining games and that you lose lp isn't fair.

Riot releases remake to help stop afks early game.  Sure its not all afks but it does stop some lp loss and frustration at least.

Community complains about how remake takes up too much time.  

Riot "Well wtf then, how do you want us to solve this problem,  hell our first test solution has almost zero way to abuse due to how early in the game it is."

Last patch you would have wasted another 20 min and 20 lp and then waited another 30 min (more like 3) to get in to another game.

I don't give a flying **** about the community. When I wait 30 damn minutes to play a game it better last more than 3 minutes I don't care if someone dc'd. To be honest most of the teams I get on the dc'd player does better than the rest of my team so hes the only one who doesn't get reported.
I love remake. Im a support main. I wait 5 second to get in a lobby. We had an AFK yesterday. I queued up again. 5 Seconds later i was in another lobby and we wont that game because it was 5v5
